main_screen.side_screen.title: Title:
tip.disable: You can disable these tips in the config
tip.change_volume: You can change the volume of muffled sounds by dragging the slider
tip.inv_button: You can move the inventory button by holding the RMB over the button and dragging it around
tip.inv_button_disable: You can disable and enable the muffler button on your inventory screen in the config
tip.play_sound: You can play any sound by pressing the corresponding Play sound button
tip.unmuffle: You can stop muffling all the selected sounds by pressing the Stop muffling sounds button, press it again to resume the muffling
tip.no_anchors: You can disable the Anchors in the config
tip.sound_blacklist: You can blacklist sounds in the config
tip.left_buttons: You can change the side of the Muffler and Play buttons to the left in the config
tip.dark_theme: You can set the dark theme in the config
tip.use_anchors: Anchors (the top 10 buttons) are used to muffle sounds in a selected area
tip.set_anchors: Click any of the Anchor buttons (the numbered ones) and then click the marker like button (in the right) to set the Anchor position
tip.modify_anchors: Once you've set the Anchors, you can click the marker button to move the position at any time.
tip.modify_anchors_2: You can change the name and range of the Anchors once you've set the position
tip.reset_recent_sounds: Hold Shift on the "Recent" sounds screen and click the trash button to clear the recent sounds list
log.warn.loadAnchorList: ESM: Anchor list not found; Creating empty Anchor list
log.error.saveAnchorList: ESM: Error saving the Anchor list\n %s
log.warn.loadMuffledList: ESM: Muffled list not found; Creating empty Muffled list
log.error.loadMuffledList: ESM: Error loading the muffled sounds list:\n %s
log.error.saveMuffledList: ESM: Error saving the muffled sounds list:\n %s
